column5: Our bunkhouse provides a cozy atmosphere and retro western vibe that accentuates any trip to Fredericksburg. Disconnect- there's no cable of wifi, but there is a DVD player with some choice westerns to watch. Indulge in a stocked mini-fridge and goody basket with local delights. Close enough to Main Street while being away from the thick of it, this affordable place to stay will elevate your memorable getaway to the Texas Hill Country.
